title: Marco Solo
creator_contributor_role: VCA Film and Television School, University of Melbourne, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italians - Australia
abstract: Poor Marco. Accidentally born into an overcrowded Australian-Italian household, he is relegated to his parents' bedroom. Nine years later Marco searches for a space of his own.
description: Poor Marco. Accidentally born into an overcrowded Australian-Italian household, he is relegated to his parents' bedroom. Nine years later, armed with a vivid imagination, an obsession with Dame Edna, and a warped sense of Catholicism, Marco searches for a space of his own. Cast includes Joseph Sollena, Robert Urban, Helen Nicholas, Irini Pappas, Maria Diele. 'Marco Solo' screened at many film festivals, including Palm Springs and London International Film Festival.
